scenario:
Salesforce, Inc. CRM introduced two new AI-driven solutions for retailers: Agentforce for Retail and Retail Cloud with Modern POS. These solutions aim to enhance productivity and deliver personalized shopping experiences. 

Agentforce for Retail offers a pre-built library of agent skills to automate tasks like order management and appointment scheduling. Retail Cloud with Modern POS integrates online and in-store data into a unified platform, providing features such as mobile POS, clienteling, and omnichannel fulfillment.

Retail Cloud with Modern POS is expected to be generally available by April 2025. Enhanced reasoning and retrieval-augmented generation capabilities will be introduced in February 2025. Commerce Skills for Guided Shopping and Commerce Skills for Order Management will be available in March 2025.

Notable customers using Salesforce solutions include SharkNinja and Saks. Nitin Mangtani, SVP and GM of Retail at Salesforce, stated that the combination of AI-powered digital tools and a modern POS system can expand retailers' operational capabilities.

Investors can gain exposure to CRM via iShares Expanded Tech-Software Sector ETF IGV and First Trust DJ Internet Index Fund FDN. CRM shares are down 2.41% at $319.03.
